item.title: Trump Admin Orders Funding Review for Dem States
item.description: The Trump administration has ordered a broad review of federal funding flowing to more than a dozen Democrat-led states, CNN reported Thursday.

item.title: Arizona Dem AG blasted for 'dangerous' claim residents can shoot ICE agents under state laws
item.description: Arizona Attorney General Kris Mayes says ICE agents could be shot under stand-your-ground law if they can't be identified as law enforcement officers.
